comment: When you check on the author of an anti Nazi story and they are a Leftist mutt with an ax to grind against Whites. Don't race mix. Your children may become confused and resentful. No race should mix.
amr:
# ::snt When you check on the author of an anti Nazi story and they are a Leftist mutt with an ax to grind against Whites. Don't race mix. Your children may become confused and resentful. No race should mix.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (c / check-01
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (a2 / author-01
                              :ARG1 (s / story
                                    :ARG0-of (o / oppose-01
                                          :ARG1 (p2 / political-party
                                                :name (n / name
                                                      :op1 "Nazi")))))))
            :op2 (m2 / mutt
                  :ARG1-of (l / left-19)
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-03
                        :ARG1 (a3 / axe
                              :ARG1-of (g / grind-01
                                    :ARG0 m2
                                    :prep-against (p3 / person
                                          :ARG1-of (w / white-02)))))))
      :snt2 (m3 / mix-01
            :polarity -
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (r / race))
      :snt3 (p4 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (b / become-01
                  :ARG1 (p5 / person
                        :ARG0-of (h2 / have-rel-role-91
                              :ARG1 y2
                              :ARG2 (c2 / child)))
                  :ARG2 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (c3 / confuse-01
                              :ARG1 p5)
                        :op2 (r2 / resent-01
                              :ARG0 p5)))
            :snt4 (r3 / recommend-01
                  :ARG1 (m4 / mix-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (r4 / race)))))

comment: All legally enforced public segregation was abolished by the Civil Rights Act of 1964. People are free to procreate with who they please.

      :snt1 (a / abolish-01
            :ARG0 (l / law
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Civil"
                        :op2 "Rights"

                  :time (d / date-entity
                        :year 1964))
            :ARG1 (s / segregate-01

                  :mod (a2 / all)))
      :snt2 (f / free-04

                  :ARG0 p
                  :accompanier (p3 / person
